description: Colostrum is the earliest milk produced by the cow and is unique in its composition

description: Butter is a dairy product made from the fat and protein components of churned cream

name: Geese Eggs
description: Goose eggs are excellent sources of many nutrients such as protein, iron, omega-3 fats
